subject: RE: [junit] junit testing with servlets
msgSnippet: Any idea when it is coming out - Amazon doesn t show it at all and searching for JUnit on bn.com just brings up a bunch of books by Marquis De Sade and other
messageBody:
Any idea when it is coming out - Amazon doesn't show it at all and searching for JUnit on bn.com just brings up a bunch of books by Marquis De Sade and other "technical" writers and the terrible Java Tools for eXtreme Programming.


Chip
-----
Programming: Its not just a job - its an indenture


-----Original Message-----
From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 21, 2003 6:50 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] junit testing with servlets


>So said Satinder Singh on 2003-05-21 --------------------
>I am a begineer I tried some small examples in junit and manage to run
>them but now when I am trying to test servlet class methods and facing
>problems can anyone tell me how to tell servlet calss methods in junit
>testing.

If you have patience, buy "JUnit Cookbook" when it comes out. :)

Do you want to test your servlet inside the container or outside the container? That's a good place to start.
